title: New Jersey Bureau of Securities Wins $14 Million Judgment Against Ponzi Schemers Who Defrauded Elderly ...
text: ( Source : Office of the Attorney General of the State of New Jersey ) NEWARK - A State Superior Court Judge has issued a judgment that orders the perpetrators of a Ponzi scheme to pay $8.6 million in full restitution for the benefit of
